name: AVAudioUnitEQ
desc: An object that implements a multiband equalizer.

items.name: init(numberOfBands: Int)
items.desc: Creates an audio unit equalizer object with the specified number of bands.

items.name: class AVAudioUnitEQFilterParameters
items.desc: An object that encapsulates the parameters that the equalizer uses.

items.name: var bands: [AVAudioUnitEQFilterParameters]
items.desc: An array of equalizer filter parameters.

items.name: var globalGain: Float
items.desc: The overall gain adjustment that the audio unit applies to the signal, in decibels.
